name: Corona's Spree
description:
Corona’s Spree is a game inspired by the 2020 worldwide pandemic virus spread, where the goal is to manage a city by preventing the evolution of population contamination while working to prevent its popularity from falling with the actions taken.

Written in MSX BASIC and compiled with MSXBAS2ROM, this is a MSX 1 compatible game.

Donate to this game and you will help us to support the MSXBAS2ROM compiler project!
